name: centipede_damascus
text: All you need to advertise is a good font!

name: fuckyoufriday
text: Wingdings is totally for blind people. It's like we care or something!

name: theloneliestmonkey
text: I want more lightbulbs over Ray's head!

name: theloneliestmonkey
text: more often, thatis

name: random_shorts
text: This caused me great amusement, by forcing me to imagine someone wondering why you would want to put like a shit ton of light bulbs over his head instead of just one.

name: achewoodno1fan
text: A comment left by achewoodno1fan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ted0phile, enough_talk, greatwhitehope7, equinn2006, Mastronaut, slalvation)

name: evolume
text: no no no.  he already had that business what sold that rad program that beef made for like keeping track of milk and what not in your damn fridge.  but then he had to make beef redundant and philippe was driven to consider suicide.

name: mustakrakesh
text: Ray is a venture capitalist.

name: miaou
text:
On these Assetbar lands, you oughta express laughter by all kinds of linguistic methods excluding acronyms.

lame = e^lol

name: miaou
text: roflmiaou

name: petro
text: Does Ray's use of "Esq." mean that that he's a lawyer? Or why isn't Mr Smuckles' CV on his blog?

name: choosebro
text: Ray is a lawyer in the same way that Bill S. Preston Esq. is a lawyer.

name: mattylite
text: Bill S. Preston Esq. & Ted "T?odor" Logan.

name: catgrl131
text: Spock, The Rock, Doc Oc, and Hulk Hogan... ^.~

name: farqussus
text: Do you have a wang? Then you too can be <enter name>, Esquire!

name: catgrl131
text: Does the wang have to have come from my body?

name: boredom_man
text:
Ahem.

An esquire is an owner of property who has no other title. Whether or not this property must be income-bearing, or can simply refer to the esquire's own home, may vary according to region. The French term is sans noblesse, which at one time was abbreviated to s'nob.

name: mustakrakesh
text: Whatever when do they kick the ass of the guy that invented Comic Sans?

name: 1000hz
text:
The font Teodor used to make Ray's logo is Ravie .

Do not ask me how I knew this.

name: zedpower
text:
Aw, man. And I really wanted to ask too.

Bummber.

name: zedpower
text: Such a bummer, it gets an extra b in a totally wrong spot.

name: songbirdspectre
text: i sort of like "Bumber"

name: zedpower
text: I'm bumb and bumber.

name: songbirdspectre
text: Bumbershoot.

name: zedpower
text: Achewood or: how I learned to stop worrying and love the bumb

name: relaxing
text: Someone set us up the bummber!!  What you say?

name: closefriend
text: If someone showed Kid Pix to Ray, he'd never leave his house again.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: i'm a- HUMONGOUS FUNGUS- on a funny cat cow that goes MOO! MEOW! and i rock the house. draw me.

name: ovenface
text: I am so disappointed in myself for not understanding until I got to the 'and I rock the house' part.

name: stuart
text: i still don't

name: stuart
text: Wait, is that a Kid Pix thing? Don't blame me, I had it for Mac.

name: slalvation
text: The best part of that program is the word processor that has a voice feature. You can type in tons of numbers, and eventually he'll say SEXTILLION! Ho ho ho!

name: direhaggis
text: That just made me imagine what he'd do with a Lite Brite set. He'd be calling people over every other day to look at walls just filled with stuff like lightbulbs and motorcycles and equations he'd gotten through Einstein.

name: i_love_kate
text: I totally prefer Ray's ventures into business after he becomes incredibly rich. Although I think it's mainly bands and... the hot dog stand? Tacos? It eludes me.

name: cailetshadow
text: Teodor really wants Ray to stop getting his ignorant hands all over that nice graphics program

name: nonemorenegative
text: Anyone who has more than a passing knowledge of graphics and whatnot will know the channelling of Pat while watching someone without a clue noodle around a layout package :)

name: envika
text: Oh god, not the faux-Chinese font again...

name: tttt2
text:
"is this one for blind people"

brilliant

name: steerpike66
text: Ray has got to do something about that big light-bulb. It presages no good ideas. all the good things that happen to Mr Smuckles are accidents.

name: courtland
text: Ray would so kickass at lawyering.

name: bpmead
text: Ray is well stoned in this strip.

name: oddell
text: you can read the last three panels in reverse order and still have a great achewood time

name: izzhov
text:
Guys as I was reading this strip, "No More Heroes" by the Stranglers popped into my head.

What does this mean?!

I like that "entrepreneur" is becoming a more established part of Ray's character in this strip.

But man. "No More Heroes." What could it mean ?
